info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued April 10 at 5:26AM PDT until April 10 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of southwest California. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Very low visibility will create dangerous driving conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dense fog will result in dangerous travel conditions during the Monday morning commute near the coast.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
